title: 5: S3E05 - "Insidious Instincts" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors The Dead Canary, Jameson Curnick, Matthew Sara, and Jonathan Reiman, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about horrific hobbies, animal instincts, risky residents, and creepy camps. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e05
